```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, comment = "", message = F, warning = F)
# load library
library(plotly)
```

## 

### About the data

The data come by default in R. The data was extracted from the 1974 Motor Trend US magazine, and comprises fuel consumption and 10 aspects of automobile design and performance for 32 automobiles (1973â€“74 models)

## The code for animated scatter plot

```{r code, echo = TRUE, eval = FALSE}
plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg, 
        frame = ~cyl) %>%
animation_opts(transition = 0)
```

## The plot for animated scatter plot

```{r plot, echo = FALSE}
plot_ly(mtcars, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg, 
        frame = ~cyl) %>%
animation_opts(transition = 0)
```
